TextBlock.Text: OENO: Our shuttle has landed safely. Friends, our survey expedition has officially begun!
CYCAD: What a lush and bountiful planet.. Imagine if we had been fortunate enough to crash onto such a hospitable planet, Oeno!
OENO: We should not work in hypotheticals, Cycad! What matters is that our clan is finally reunited.. and that we have been given the chance to explore this new planet together!
CYCAD: Oeno, what was that?! Something is scampering around our campsite!
OENO: I have located the entity you noticed, Cycad. Fear not: it does not appear to be hostile!
CYCAD: That is a relief to hear.. But that aside: we have found a new species native to this star system already!
OENO: How exciting! I cannot wait to share our discoveries here with our friends back home.
OENO: Wait, my friend! Do not be shy! Where are you going?
OENO: The lifeform has fled deeper into the mountain! Come, Cycad: let us follow it!
